price: Tanto si mueren como si caen por la causa de Dios, serán congregados ante Dios.
arabic: وَلَئِن مُّتُّمۡ أَوۡ قُتِلۡتُمۡ لَإِلَى ٱللَّهِ تُحۡشَرُونَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Isa Garcia
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish by Muhammad Isa Garcia - Printed in 1433 H.

meta.transliteration: wala-in muttum aw qutil'tum la-ilā al-lahi tuḥ'sharūna
